link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Total values should be summation of the values reported for all 50 records for all monetary information
generic:link.label:label: SectionA-Aggregate values
generic:link.msg:message: Total values should be summation of the values reported for counterparty for all monetary information
generic:link.label:label: Section C-Aggregate values
generic:link.msg:message: "Mobile" and "Landline" numbers must have positive numeric values
generic:link.label:label: Positive numeric values to be entered for mobile and landline numbers
generic:link.msg:message:
Validation not satisfied:
Limit Sanctioned - Funded >= 0, if Funded - Amount Outstanding >= 0
generic:link.label:label: Limit Sanctioned - Funded > 0, if Funded - Amount Outstanding > 0
generic:link.msg:message:
Validation not satisfied:
Limit Sanctioned - Non-Funded >= 0, if Non Funded - Amount Outstanding >= 0
generic:link.label:label: Limit Sanctioned - Non-Funded > 0, if Non Funded - Amount Outstanding > 0
generic:link.msg:message:
Validation not satisfied:
Funded Credit Exposure >= MIN(Funded Limit Sanctioned MINUS Amount Elegible for netting from Funded Exposure, Funded - Amount Outstanding MINUS Amount Elegible
generic:link.label:label: Funded Credit Exposure >= MIN(Funded Limit Sanctioned MINUS Amount Elegible for netting from Funded Exposure, Funded - Amount Outstanding MINUS Amount Elegible
generic:link.msg:message:
Validation not satisfied:
Non Funded Credit Exposure >= MIN(Non-Funded Limit Sanctioned MINUS Amount Elegible for netting from Non Funded Exposure, Non Funded - Amount Outstanding MINUS Amount Elegible for netting from Non Funded Exposure)
generic:link.label:label: Non Funded Credit Exposure >= MIN(Non-Funded Limit Sanctioned MINUS Amount Elegible for netting from Non Funded Exposure, Non Funded - Amount Outstanding MINUS Amount Elegible for netting from Non Funded Exposure)
generic:link.msg:message:
Validation not satisfied:
Total Credit Exposure >= MIN(Total Limit Sanctioned to the Borrower MINUS Amount Elegible for netting from Funded and Non Funded Exposure, Total Amount Outstanding (Funded + Non Funded MINUS Amount Elegible for netting from Funded and Non Funded Exposure))
"TCE as % of Capital Funds" = TCE * 100/ ([Regulatory Capital (Tier I + Tier II) of Previous March) + (Capital Infusion during the period (April to date))]
generic:link.label:label: TCE as % of Capital Funds = TCE * 100/ [Regulatory Capital (Tier I + Tier II) of Previous March + Capital Infusion during the period (April to date)]
generic:link.msg:message: Value in "Amount" field should be positive
TE as % of Capital Funds = (Total Exposure) *100 / [(Regulatory Capital (Tier I + Tier II) of Previous March) + (Capital Infusion during the period (April to date))]
generic:link.label:label: TE as % of Capital Funds = Total Exposure *100 / [Regulatory Capital (Tier I + Tier II) of Previous March + Capital Infusion during the period (April to date)]
generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of "Name of signatory" is mandatory
generic:link.label:label: "Name of signatory" is mandatory information to be reported
generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of " Designation of signatory" is mandatory
generic:link.label:label: "Designation of signatory" is mandatory information to be reported
generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of "Authorised signatory Mobile number" is mandatory.
generic:link.label:label: "Authorised signatory mobile number" is mandatory information to be reported
generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of "Authorised signatory landline number" is mandatory
generic:link.label:label: "Authorised signatory landline number" is mandatory information to be reported
generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of " Email id of Authorised reporting official " is mandatory
generic:link.label:label: "Email Id of authorised reporting official " is mandatory information to be reported
generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of "Whether there is Nil Reporting" field is mandatory
Total of all groups should be summation of the values reported for all monetary information
"Total exposure" should greater than or equal to 0
TE as % of Capital Funds = Total Exposure *100 / [(Regulatory Capital (Tier I + Tier II) of Previous March) + (Capital Infusion during the period (April to date))]
